body: "Once again the Jamaican nation is on Buju watch": Active Voice highlights the posts of some fellow bloggers to underscore her point that "Jamaicans are taking this very personally, it is as if the nation itself is on trial."
original_body: "Once again the Jamaican nation is on Buju watch": Active Voice highlights the posts of some fellow bloggers to underscore her point that "Jamaicans are taking this very personally, it is as if the nation itself is on trial."
title: Jamaica: On "Buju Watch"
